title: Grand Central Market
creator_credit: William Hale and United States Information Agency
brief_description: In the city of Los Angeles, California, is a large central food market catering for the needs of its large population. This film shows the mixed population of the area shopping in an atmosphere of freedom and friendship.
creator_credit_for_label: William Hale and United States Information Agency
